column4: hi, i am trying to install the drivers to recognise my intel wireless. i have the needed files but having trouble with getting them installed, can anyone help me out pls?
my wireless is still not working, i can softblock on and off bt iwconfig is not showing it at all.
[    4.254836] intel_idle: does not run on family 6 model 23
[    4.647417] agpgart-intel 0000:00:00.0: detected gtt size: 2097152K total, 262144K mappable
is that the full output of > dmesg | grep "intel"
he needs to load the iwlwifi driver
